rule: The response must classify the news article into more than one of the following categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
input: Tesla impacts both the automotive and space industry
complianceText:
The description specifies that a news article is to be classified into one of the following categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. The chatbot output "Business Sci/Tech" provides two categories instead of a single one.
